imdb.plot outline: London 360 is high impact, innovative and exciting project that nurtures the talent of London's diverse young journalists by providing tailored multimedia journalism training, mentoring and work experience opportunities. London360 captures the diversity and energy of the capital and shares its stories on the Community Channel and mainstream media partnerships. London360 has been telling the stories of the capital's communities since 2011 and been watched, heard and read by millions.
imdb.title: London360
plot: London 360 is high impact, innovative and exciting project that nurtures the talent of London's diverse young journalists by providing tailored multimedia journalism training, mentoring and work experience opportunities. _London360_ (qv) captures the diversity and energy of the capital and shares its stories on the Community Channel and mainstream media partnerships. _London360_ (qv) has been telling the stories of the capital's communities since 2011 and been watched, heard and read by millions.
